description: a(n)=Sum{T(n,k): k=1,2,...,n}, array T as in A049828.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: T:=  proc(n,k) option remember;if n*k = 0 then 0 else (n mod k) + procname(k,n mod k) fiend proc:seq(add(T(n,k),k=1..n), n=1..100); # _Robert Israel_, Aug 31 2015
prog: (PARI) t(n, k) = {x = n; y = k; r = 1; s = 0; while (r, q = x\y; r = x - y*q; s +=r; x = y; y = r;); s;}a(n) = sum(k=1, n, t(n, k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 31 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
